reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Freelancer Kim Chowon is one of many middling frontline tanks that struggle to carve a niche for themselves. She is painfully average, with decent defensive stats and a low impact skill set. Kim Chowonâ€™s main gimmick are the 3 mines that deploy alongside her, providing limited defensive utility to the backline by stunning enemies that trigger them. Kim Chowon is notable in that she is one of the few frontline tanks that can hit air units. She is otherwise unimpressive.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVE, Kim Chowon meets the baseline requirements expected of her as a frontline tank, and contributes nothing more to the team.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVP, Kim Chowon is considered one of the weaker options among the viable-but-not-meta frontline tanks. While her mines offer protection against aggressive striker-based comps and forward deploy units, it is often the case that the mines will not significantly affect the final outcome of a match. She does not have the stats or the kit to distinguish herself from the pool of stronger alternatives (e.g. Rearm Kaci, Rearm Alex), but for when those stronger alternatives are inevitably rotated out via the weekly ban system, she may see consideration as frontline for the week. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- Mines will always impress when baseline performance expectations are at ground level.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- Can hit air.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- Objectively the best skin in the game.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

description.description: A Defender who can evade enemy attacks while protecting her ship

baseDescription.baseDescription: Fires her handgun to deal damage to the foremost target. Fires in burst mode to nearby enemies, dealing 50% increased damage and inflicting knockback.

For 40s after deployment, Chowon summons 1 [Stationary Mine - Kapow] in front of the ship and 2 handmade [Chasing Mine - Kachow] for 40 seconds.

Chasing Mine - Kachow: Detonates upon ground enemy detection, inflicting Stun to enemies within range for 2 seconds. 
Stationary Mine - Kapow: Nullifies damage upon receiving Hitstun from ground enemy Special Skill, then disappears after inflicting Stun to enemies within range for 2 seconds. After, increases the EVA of allies within range by 200 for 8 seconds.

level5.level5: Grants Immunity to Hitstun from Special or lower skills and Skill Haste +40% for 8 s after 14 evasions

baseDescription.baseDescription: Swings a detonation cord attached to her handmade explosives before detonating it to deal AoE damage and levitate enemies. EVA +20% for 10 seconds in proportion to the number of damaged enemies (up to 100%).

level5.level5: Ranged DMG RES +6% added to buff (up to 30%)

baseDescription.baseDescription: Moves swiftly and causes a massive explosion with the detonation cord, dealing AoE damage to enemies in front and levitating them. Removes all debuffs on self and becomes Invincible during skill.

level5.level5: Special Skill cooldown -4 s (up to 20 s) and Ultimate Skill cooldown -3 s (up to 15 s) in proportion to number of damaged enemies.
